channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: In the Garden with Thompson & Morgan
channel.desc: Enjoy gorgeous plants and flowers in your garden from Thompson & Morgan, one of the UK's oldest horticulture firms and an established household name for gardeners across the country.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: QVC Garden Party
channel.desc: Get ready to host the perfect garden party with top products and tips on how to create the ultimate space for entertaining and relaxing. There'll be furniture, lighting, party clothing, food and more.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Footwear Sale
channel.desc: Comfortable, stylish and ideal for any occasion, this show will feature offers on selected footwear. Whatever shoe you're looking for, you're sure to find the perfect fit in our footwear sale.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: MarlaWynne Fashion
channel.desc: Easy care, easy wear, easy elegance in this mix and match collection of unique and versatile pieces created for the smart, elegant, busy women seeking comfort that doesn't compromise style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: MarlaWynne Fashion
channel.desc: Easy care, easy wear, easy elegance in this mix and match collection of unique and versatile pieces created for the smart, elegant, busy women seeking comfort that doesn't compromise style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Nina Leonard Summer Styles
channel.desc: Fill your summer wardrobe with beautifully designed dresses, skirts and more from Nina Leonard.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Summer Dress Sale
channel.desc: Summer Dress Sale.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Morning Style with Katy
channel.desc: Join Katy and our trusted stylists and fashion experts as we help you create your perfect wardrobe, showing you how to bring key pieces and different looks together to showcase your personal style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Summertime Style with White Stuff
channel.desc: Summertime Style with White Stuff.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion Sale
channel.desc: A great time to fill up your wardrobe with amazing bargains - from this year's finest fashions to tried-and-tested classics.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ben de Lisi Sale
channel.desc: Bag yourself some fabulous fashion deals with Ben de Lisi, who offers style staples that encapsulate modern elegance, from stunning dresses to chic separates. Discover what's on offer in this show.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Dannii Minogue Fashion
channel.desc: Discover fashion to flatter your shape with Dannii Minogue's beautiful range of on-trend styles, which offers a full spectrum of petite and regular sizes designed to help you find your perfect fit.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Vionic Footwear with FMT Technology
channel.desc: A fashionable and comfortable footwear range with biomechanically-designed orthotic technology, which helps restore natural foot function and promote well-being with every step.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: The Jewellery Box
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Fashion Steals and Deals.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Monsoon Sale
channel.desc: From Portobello Road to household name, the Monsoon fashion collection has earned its place in the nation's wardrobes. Join us to discover unmissable Sale offers on fantastic pieces from the range.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Morning Style with Katy
channel.desc: Join Katy and our trusted stylists and fashion experts as we help you create your perfect wardrobe, showing you how to bring key pieces and different looks together to showcase your personal style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford Fashion
channel.desc: Tune in for style advice and inspiration from Ruth, plus find everything from a great pair of jeans and a stylish jacket, to chic pieces featuring pops of colour and vibrant print.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Best of QVC Style
channel.desc: Catch all the recent highlights from our sister channel with the Best of QVC Style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% off Frank Usher Sale
channel.desc: Up to 50% off Frank Usher Sale.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ben de Lisi Sale
channel.desc: Bag yourself some fabulous fashion deals with Ben de Lisi, who offers style staples that encapsulate modern elegance, from stunning dresses to chic separates. Discover what's on offer in this show.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.title: Fashion on Friday with Julia
channel.desc: Offering great colours, quality fabrics and exciting fashion designs for every woman. Treat yourself and go shopping with Julia Roberts.

channel.title: Anouska's Garden Oasis

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Plants & Flowers with Richard Jackson
channel.desc: Join our resident expert Richard Jackson as he shares his top tips for the coming season, with exciting new plant varieties alongside classic blooms and shrubs.
